_sText:
3 layer fight yard, based in a castle with glass roof.

Spawns for 12 per side.

This map is a mirror image of its self with the CT starting on one side of the center wall T's start the other side of the center wall.

***Tips***
Each half of the map is colour coded by the lighting  (Blue for CT)  (Red for T) This should help you keep track of which half of the map you're in.

Use your ears. Each level has a different flooring type.
Ground floor - tiles
First floor - wood
Second floor steel.
Use your enemies sound to your advantage.

Keep moving work as a team, its easy to get out flanked and surrounded.



Hope you enjoy the map please comment with any bugs, improvements etc.

Rick_0_Shay
